title: Polish cherry cake
ingredients: ['200g caster sugar', '300g plain flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 tablespoon butter', '200g pitted sweet cherries', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '120ml olive oil', '4 eggs', '170g plain yogurt', '1 tablespoon olive oil']
